model.interfaces

Interface IBalance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Balance

    public interface IBalance
    This interface models the summary of the incomes related to the expositions made until the current date.
    Author:
    Sofia Rosetti

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> getIncomes()
      This method returns the map containing the specific income for every year.
      double getPreviousIncome(int year)
      Given an year, this method returns the specific income.
      double profit(java.util.Map<IExhibit,java.lang.Double> inc)
      This method calculates and returns the total income at the current date.

    • Method Detail

      • getIncomes

        java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> getIncomes()
        This method returns the map containing the specific income for every year.
        Returns:
        the incomes map

      • profit

        double profit(java.util.Map<IExhibit,java.lang.Double> inc)
        This method calculates and returns the total income at the current date.
        Parameters:
        inc - the map of the expositions and the related incomes
        Returns:
        the total income at the current date

      • getPreviousIncome

        double getPreviousIncome(int year)
        Given an year, this method returns the specific income.
        Parameters:
        year - the year of the required income
        Returns:
        the income of the given year
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the given exposition isn't present
